mapper.select: select * from dts_collect t1, (select article_id data_id,title,author_id,create_date,synopsis from dts_article where author_id = (select author_id from uts_author where username = #{username}) union select video_id data_id,title,author_id,create_date,synopsis from dts_video where author_id = (select author_id from uts_author where username = #{username}) ) t2 where t1.data_id = t2.data_id order by t1.create_date desc
